message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA 

This paper deals with reinforcement learning and decision making under uncertainty, which are core topics in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper proposes a Bayesian approach to reinforcement learning, which is a popular subfield of machine learning. The paper also discusses the scalability of the proposed algorithm, which is a common concern in robotics and control systems, falling under the categories of robotics (cs.RO) and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper discusses the use of expert knowledge, which is a common theme in multi-agent systems and human-robot interaction, falling under the categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and multi-agent systems (cs.MA).
